content: Nam Hyeongseog, also known as AZERC, is a Full-Stack Developer specializing in the Nexus of Innovation: integrating AI Agents, Blockchain transparency, and Interactive 3D Engines. He focuses on building robust, premium applications that push technical boundaries.

Core skills include: AI (LLM integration, Agentic workflows using AI SDK), Blockchain (Web3, Solidity, Smart Contracts, ESG platforms), and 3D Graphics (Three.js, WebGL, Shader programming). Tech stack: Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Framer Motion, Drizzle ORM, Zod, Luxon.
A laboratory for advanced WebGL and 3D engine demonstrations. It showcases high-performance rendering, complex geometry, and interactive 3D environments built with Three.js and custom shaders.
An intelligent chatbot implementation designed with seamless UX. It utilizes advanced LLM integrations to provide context-aware responses and interactive user experiences.

A transparent ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) investment platform built on blockchain. It uses Creditcoin for RWA (Real World Asset) investments, featuring 'Hold to Earn' and reinvestment (compounding) mechanics. Contract addresses and chain details are managed via Creditcoin mainnet/testnet.
A high-performance content platform built using Next.js 15, optimized for SEO, speed, and premium readability.

AI Agent Studio is a centralized laboratory for developing and mastering autonomous AI agents. It features over 20 distinct projects demonstrating various agentic workflows using LangGraph, CrewAI, and AutoGen. Key agents include a News Reader, Job Hunter, and Deep Research Clone. The tech stack focuses on Google Gemini (including Gemini 1.5 Flash), Python, and sophisticated web scraping tools like Firecrawl.
The investment process in BondBase follows a structured flow: 1. Faucet (for test assets) -> 2. Bond Market exploration -> 3. Investment execution. Users can track their portfolio and impact map.
